natspec.author: chefgonpachi

__init__(address,address,address).notice: Recipe Number 03 - Takes an existing token and creates a liquidity farm

params.farmFactory: - A factory that makes farms that can stake and reward your new tokens
params.sushiswapFactory: - The SushiSwap factory to create new pools

createLiquidityFarm(address,uint256,uint.notice: Creates a farm for rewarding liquidity with WETH backed SLP tokens

params.allocPoint: - Initial weighting of the lp token. Set relative to additional pools
params.devAddr: - Any donations if set are sent here
params.rewardsPerBlock: - Rewards per block for the whole farm
params.tokensToFarm: - Total amount of tokens to be sent to the farm as rewards

createTokenFarm(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Creates a farm for rewarding tokens for staking a different token

params.allocPoint: - Initial weighting of the lp token. Set relative to additional pools
params.devAddr: - Any donations if set are sent here
params.rewardsPerBlock: - Rewards per block for the whole farm
params.tokensToFarm: - Total amount of tokens to be sent to the farm as rewards

natspec.notice: Use this contract to create a liquidity farm from exisiting tokens
natspec.title: MVP for preparing a MISO set menu
